verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Eliphaz|strong="H0464"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Themanite \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Can|strong="H1397"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* compared \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1397"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* perfect knowledge?

\w What|strong="H2656"\w* doth \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w profit|strong="H1215"\w* God \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w just|strong="H6663"\w*? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w what|strong="H2656"\w* dost thou \w give|strong="H6663"\w* \w him|strong="H6663"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* unspotted?

Shall \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* thee \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*:
\w And|strong="H5771"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* thy manifold \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* thy infinite \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w taken|strong="H6584"\w* away \w the|strong="H3588"\w* pledge \w of|strong="H0251"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w without|strong="H2600"\w* \w cause|strong="H2600"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w of|strong="H0251"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w clothing|strong="H0899"\w*.

Thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H8248"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w weary|strong="H5889"\w*, thou hast withdrawn \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w from|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w strength|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* thou didst possess \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* being \w the|strong="H6440"\w* most \w mighty|strong="H2220"\w* thou holdest \w it|strong="H5375"\w*.

Thou hast \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w widows|strong="H0490"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H2220"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* thou hast broken \w in|strong="H7971"\w* pieces.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* art thou \w surrounded|strong="H5439"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w snares|strong="H6341"\w*, \w and|strong="H5439"\w* \w sudden|strong="H6597"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* troubleth thee.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* didst thou \w think|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* thou shouldst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* thou shouldst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w with|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* violence \w of|strong="H4325"\w* overflowing \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*?

Dost \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou \w think|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w is|strong="H7218"\w* \w higher|strong="H7311"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w is|strong="H7218"\w* elevated above \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* thou sayst: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* doth \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*? \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* judgeth \w as|strong="H0410"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w were|strong="H8199"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w a|strong="H4100"\w* mist.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* covert, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* walketh \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* poles \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.

Dost thou desire \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w path|strong="H0734"\w* \w of|strong="H0734"\w* \w ages|strong="H5769"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w trodden|strong="H1869"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* taken \w away|strong="H7059"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* flood hath overthrown \w their|strong="H0834"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0410"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*: \w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H0559"\w*: \w and|strong="H5493"\w* looked upon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w as|strong="H0410"\w* if \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w could|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* nothing:

Whereas \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1931"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* things: whose way \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thinking \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* shall \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* shall \w laugh|strong="H3932"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* scorn.

\w Is|strong="H0784"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* exaltation \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* down, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* remnants \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w*?

\w Submit|strong="H0935"\w* thyself \w then|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w at|strong="H0935"\w* peace: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thereby thou shalt \w have|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w best|strong="H2896"\w* fruits.

\w Receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, thou shalt \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* shalt \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* shall give \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w flint|strong="H6697"\w*, \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w flint|strong="H6697"\w* torrents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H1220"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* against thy enemies, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* heaped together \w for|strong="H3701"\w* thee.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shalt thou abound \w in|strong="H5921"\w* delights \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*.

Thou shalt \w pray|strong="H6279"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* he \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* thou shalt \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

Thou shalt \w decree|strong="H1504"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* thing, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* shall \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* shall \w shine|strong="H5050"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w been|strong="H8213"\w* humbled, shall \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* glory: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* shall bow \w down|strong="H8213"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4422"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="H4422"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* he shall be \w saved|strong="H4422"\w* by \w the|strong="H4422"\w* \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w his|strong="H4422"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.
